attributes.action: Increase sentencing for knife crime, with a minimum 15 year custodial sentance.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the Government and Courts to support our Police Forces and protect the public by throwing the book at knife welding offenders.

There is a epidemic of violent crime across the country and particularly in London. This needs to be tackled immediately. 

Tougher sentancing will act as a deterrent to people who are involved in knife crime. 

It will not deter everyone, but by having long sentances, the undeterred criminals will be off the streets and not be a threat to public safety.
attributes.background:
Possession of a prohibited knife/bladed article in public to carry a minimum custodial sentance of 15 years in prison, with a minimum of 20 years for weapons such as machetes & swords.

Offenders under 18 should receive the same punishment as an offender over 18 due to the gravity of the crime.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Increase sentences relating to knife crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563199

Zero Tolerance on Knife Crime: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581806

Minimum 10-year sentence for knife possession and 20 years for use of a knife: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580709
